associatedResourceIdentifier.description: OSS Resource identifier - e.g., if the AssociatedResourceType is Request this would be the RequestId.

associatedResourceType.description: OSS resource type (e.g., Request, ComponentVersion etc.) to which the extension data is associated with.

history.description: History items associated with the extension data.

identifier.description: Identifier/Key used by the extension to store/retrieve data.

alias.description: Alias of the property. Example "ct" for component type

targetView.description: Name of the view where this filter is shown.

isDefaultColumn.description: Indicates whether or not to show this property by default.

targetView.description: Name of the view where this property is shown.

tags.description: Tag are user specified tags associated with validation request e.g. RELEASE, Build No

associatedResourceType.description: ResourceType with which this property is associated.

extensionDetails.description: List of details to extract the property from different extension data

flags.description: Defines the flags set for this property.

extensionDataType.description: Defines the type defined in extensionData. Example: Registration, ComponentVersion etc.

extensionIdentifier.description: Identifier of the extension from which value needs to be extracted.

propertyPath.description: Path of the property which contains the value for property.

isMandatory.description: Indicates whether property is mandatory or not while POST operation on associated resource.

isResourceUniqueKey.description: Indicates whether property contributes to unique key for the resource.

isValidationRequired.description: Indicates whether property needs to be validated in validation service or not.
